name: Breakout: 死中求活
description:
"Breakout: 死中求活" is a high-speed breakout game.

You can shoot a new ball with a mouse click, which will destroy the blocks quickly.
However, each time you shoot a ball, the paddle gets shorter.
Challenge four levels in a row and compete for the total time.

Getting under 1 minute is difficult, but not impossible.

Staff:
Yumehiko - Game Desgin, Art.
Komekami - Music.
Tsukihiko - Music, Sound Effect.
